description: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 3 has sparked massive online buzz thanks to its promised adaptation of the Culling Game arc. The anime community is praising the visuals, character evolution, and darker tone, while some viewers have mixed feelings about pacing and emotional intensity.
title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 3 Release: Know When and Where to Watch the Culling Game Arc

description: The upcoming Prime Video holiday special Oh. What. Fun. has gained attention on social media for its relatable story about underappreciated mothers and festive chaos. Fans are praising Michelle Pfeiffer’s performance as Claire and expressing excitement for the show’s mix of humor, adventure, and heartwarming holiday moments.
title: Oh. What. Fun. OTT Release: When, Where to Watch the Michelle Pfeiffer-Starring Holiday Comedy

description: Sunny Sanskari Ki Tulsi Kumari is a Varun Dhawan-starrer romantic comedy film that has made its way to the digital screens. The plot explores themes of romance, relationships, and emotions.
title: Sunny Sanskari Ki Tulsi Kumari Is Streaming Now: Know Where to Watch Online

description: Indane Gas is a government-owned gas brand. It is a subsidiary of Indian Oil, an Indian energy company. Indane Gas allows its customers to book an LPG cylinder through multiple online and offline methods. You can visit a nearby gas distributor to book a cylinder. However, if one is not available, you can either visit the company's website, download the IndianOil ONE mobile app, leave a missed call, or send an SMS to book the same. Here's a step-by-step guide to help you book an Indane Gas LPG cylinder.
title: Indane Gas Booking Numbers: How to Book LPG Cylinder Using Different Methods

description: Infinix on Thursday teased a new collaboration via its social media handles, confirming a partnership with legendary Italian design house Pininfarina. The company has not revealed the name of the design studio, but the poster features Pininfarina’s logo. Infinix hasn’t announced which smartphone will be launched as part of the collaboration, but it’s confirmed to launch next month.
title: Infinix Teases New Smartphone Co-Designed With Pininfarina, Launch Set for Next Month

description: OpenAI has rejected claims that ChatGPT contributed to a teenager’s suicide, arguing the lawsuit relied on selective excerpts of their conversations. The company says it has submitted the full transcript to provide context and noted ChatGPT repeatedly urged the teen to seek help. OpenAI cited its liability limits and said its products should not be treated as a sole source of truth.
title: OpenAI Rejects Allegations of ChatGPT’s Role in Teenager’s Suicide, Says Full Context Missing

description: Cyberpunk 2077 sales have crossed 35 million units, CD Project Red announced Wednesday during its Q3 2025 earnings call. The RPG has reached the sales milestone in five years after its launch in 2020. CD Projekt also shared an update on the development of Cyberpunk 2.
title: Cyberpunk 2077 Sells 35 Million Copies, CD Project Red Shares Update on Cyberpunk 2 Development

description: The X app has received a new feature, which will show posts in the 'Following' timeline using Grok's AI capabilities, Elon Musk announced on Thursday. The AI agent will determine the relevance of a post, along with the user's past engagement and the people they follow, to rank posts above the most recent ones. However, the company is giving people the option to revert to the chronological feed. Additionally, the prices in India of the two X Premium subscriptions have been reduced.
title: Elon Musk’s X Will Now Rank Following Feed Posts Using Grok’s AI Capabilities

description: Honor Magic 8 Pro has been launched in Malaysia in 12GB + 512GB and 16GB + 1TB RAM and storage options. The global variant has a 7,100mAh battery supporting 100W wired and 80W wireless fast charging. This is a downgrade from the Chinese version, which has a 7,200mAh battery and faster 120W wired charging alongside 80W wireless charging support.
title: Honor Magic 8 Pro Launched Globally With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5, 7,100mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Kantara: A Legend - Chapter 1, written and directed by Rishab Shetty, is a Kannada Period drama movie that is now streaming on Amazon Prime Video. Overall, it has been a super hit at the box office.
title: Kantara: A Legend - Chapter 1 Hindi Version Now Streaming in Hindi: Where to Watch it Online?

description: OpenAI says some API user data was exposed in a recent Mixpanel breach, though its products and sensitive information such as API keys and payment details were not affected. The leaked dataset appears to include basic profile details and analytics metadata from platform.openai.com. OpenAI has stopped using Mixpanel, is investigating the incident, and has advised affected users to watch for phishing attempts.
title: OpenAI Confirms User Data Exposed After Mixpanel Security Breach

description: Poco on Wednesday launched the Poco F8 series as its latest flagship lineup. Alongside, the company also announced the release schedule of HyperOS 3. The Android 16-based operating system (OS) was unveiled in September and is offered out-of-the-box on the latest Xiaomi 17 series. As per the company, the Poco F7 series and Poco X7 series will be among the first handsets in Poco’s lineup to receive HyperOS 3, followed by its rollout to Poco M and C-series models next year.
title: Poco F7 Series, Poco X7 and X7 Pro to Get HyperOS 3 Update This Month: Release Schedule

description: Samsung’s Galaxy S26 Ultra is drawing early attention with leaks suggesting design tweaks, including a darker frame that may make bezels appear thicker, and a new AI-powered privacy display. At the same time, early Galaxy S27 Ultra details indicate Samsung has cancelled plans to adopt a larger 1/1.1-inch 200-megapixel sensor, reportedly due to cost concerns, and will continue using a 1/1.3-inch unit. This contrasts with Sony and OmniVision’s newly launched 200-megapixel sensors, which are set to appear in upcoming flagship phones from Chinese brands.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Rumours Point to Darker Frame, Same Camera Hardware

description: Bitcoin climbed above $91,000 as improving sentiment, institutional accumulation and cooling macro pressures supported a broader market rebound. Altcoins also gained, with Solana, XRP and BNB showing steady strength. Analysts said strengthening ETF inflows, easing volatility and firm demand from large holders could help Bitcoin attempt a move toward the $92,000–$95,000 zone, though key support must hold to prevent renewed consolidation.
title: Bitcoin Trades Near $91,300 as Accumulation Signals Strengthen Across Crypto Market

description: Oppo’s rumoured Find N6 is reportedly undergoing testing in India, according to a tipster, though its launch in the country is still uncertain. The foldable is expected to be thinner and lighter than typical models, following the Find N5, which debuted as the world’s thinnest foldable. The tipster also noted that it is unlikely to launch under the OnePlus brand. With limited details available and no confirmation from Oppo, the device’s release plans in the country remain unclear.
title: Oppo Find N6 Allegedly Being Tested in India Amid Uncertain Launch Plans

description: Netflix brings back Stranger Things for its final season, starting with Volume 1 now streaming in India. Packed with suspense, supernatural chaos, and strong performances, the new episodes dive deeper into the battle against Vecna. The upcoming volumes in December 2025 and January 2026 will complete the epic story, making Season 5 one of the biggest TV events of the year.
title: Stranger Things 5 Volume 1 Now Streaming on Netflix: Everything You Need to Know

description: Aan Paavam Pollathathu is a relatable relationship-based drama streaming on JioHotstar from November 28, 2025. With strong performances, modern emotions, and an IMDb rating of 7.2, the film connects with audiences across languages by highlighting the struggles many couples face today.
title: Aan Paavam Pollathathu Premieres on JioHotstar Soon: What You Need to Know

description: Indrajaal Ranger is claimed to be India’s first AI-powered anti-drone patrol vehicle that can deal with unauthorised drones in a variety of ways, including taking over the aerial threat, jamming and neutralising its instruments, and even directly killing the threat. It has a detection range of up to 10kms.
title: Indrajaal Ranger Debuts as India’s First AI-Driven Anti-Drone Patrol Vehicle

description: Updating your phone number in Google and Gmail accounts is essential for both account security and recovery. It is important to get verification codes, password reset links, and two-factor authentication prompts. Without access to the phone number linked, you could be locked out of your account. Here’s a step-by-step guide to update the phone number linked to your Google or Gmail account.
title: Know How to Change the Phone Number Linked to Your Google and Gmail Account

description: Redmi 15C 5G India launch date was announced by the Xiaomi sub-brand on Thursday. The handset, which recently debuted in Poland, will be unveiled in India in the first week of December. The phone will be offered via Amazon and the Xiaomi India website. Other details, like the battery capacity, chipset, camera configuration, and design, will be announced by the Xiaomi sub-brand in the coming days. It is tipped to be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity chip, paired with a 6,000mAh battery.
title: Redmi 15C 5G India Launch Date Set for Early December; Amazon Availability Confirmed: See Expected Price, Specifications

description: HP PCs and laptops could reportedly witness a price hike and reduction in memory configuration amid the global RAM shortage. As per the report, HP CEO Enrique Lores reportedly addressed the memory shortage and resultant price surge in a recent earnings calls, highlighting that the company might be forced to hike prices of its products in the second half of 2026.
title: HP PCs Could Reportedly See Price Hike, Reduced Configurations Amid Global Memory Shortage

description: The iPhone 17 was launched in India in September, bringing about meaningful upgrades over its predecessor. Among those was a bump in the base storage to 256GB, which came at a price increase of about Rs. 3,000 over the iPhone 16. A tipster claims that Apple could hike the price of all SKUs of the iPhone 17 in India. This is attributed to the high demand for the handset and the brand running low on stocks.
title: iPhone 17 Tipped to Receive a Price Hike in India Amid Stock Shortage and High Demand

description: Your favorite OTT platforms are ready to buzz your digital screens with ultimate romance, horror, thriller, and more. Top releases include Stranger Things Season 5, Kantara Hindi, and Primitive War, and more
title: OTT Releases of the Week (Nov 24 - Nov 30): Stranger Things Season 5 Vol 1, Sunny Sanskari Ki Tusli Kumari, Mass Jathara, Aaryan, and More

description: Sony has announced PS Plus monthly games for December. Next month, the PlayStation parent will add five games to the Essential PS Plus tier, instead of the usual three. December's PS Plus monthly games include Lego Horizon Adventures, Killing Floor 3, The Outlast Trials, Neon White, and Synduality Echo of Ada.
title: PS Plus Monthly Games for December Announced: Lego Horizon Adventures, Killing Floor 3, Neon White and More

description: Realme recently announced that it will launch the Realme P4x 5G in India in the first week of December, alongside the Watch 5. Both new devices will be available in the country via Flipkart. Now, the company has revealed the colour options for its new smartphone. It is teased to launch with a MediaTek Dimensity chip, paired with 8GB of RAM and 256GB of UFS 3.1 onboard storage. It will be offered in the country in three colourways - green, white, and pink.
title: Realme P4x 5G Colourways, Key Specifications Revealed Ahead of India Launch

description: Samsung Galaxy A37 5G could launch soon. While its launch date remains a mystery, a recent Geekbench listing has suggested its model number and key specifications. The Galaxy A37 5G could ship with the Exynos 1480 chipset. It is likely to include 6GB RAM and could run on Android 16. The new phone may come with upgrades over the Galaxy A36 5G.
title: Samsung Galaxy A37 5G Spotted on Geekbench With Exynos Chipset, Android 16

description: Sony has announced the LYTIA 901, its first 200-megapixel smartphone image sensor, built on a 1/1.12-type design with 0.7-micron pixels and scheduled for mass production in November 2025. It uses a Quad-Quad Bayer layout and AI-based remosaicing to deliver detailed images and 4x in-sensor zoom. The sensor supports multiple HDR systems, 4K video, all-pixel autofocus, and advanced low-light performance. It may debut in the Oppo Find X9 Ultra and Vivo X300 Ultra in 2026.
title: Sony's 200-Megapixel LYTIA 901 Sensor Announced With AI Processing, 4x In-Sensor Zoom

description: Vivo S50 series is set to launch in China in December. The lineup, including the Vivo S50 and Vivo S50 Pro Mini, will be unveiled as the successor to the Vivo S30 series. While the exact launch date for the handsets is yet to be announced, a Vivo Product Manager has been teasing the specifications of the Vivo S50 series on Weibo for a while. Now, the company executive has shared an image of one of the handsets in the lineup, revealing its design.
title: Vivo S50 Series Design Revealed; Key Specifications Tipped Ahead of Launch

description: Apple has approached the Delhi High Court to challenge an amended CCI penalty rule that lets regulators impose fines based on a company’s global turnover. The company argues the formula is arbitrary and disproportionate, noting it could face penalties of up to $38 billion if found guilty in an ongoing App Store investigation. The case is scheduled for a hearing on December 3.
title: Apple Challenges India’s Antitrust Penalty Law That Could Cost It $38 Billion: Report

description: Apple has been rumoured to be developing a new iPad Mini model with an OLED screen for some time now. A tipster on the Chinese microblogging platform Weibo has now revealed its expected launch timeline. As per the claims, the purported tablet will be introduced no earlier than next year. The next-generation iPad Mini is likely to lead the transition of OLED display upgrades across Apple’s upcoming MacBook Air, iPad Mini, and iPad Air lineups.
title: Eighth-Generation iPad Mini With OLED Display Could Launch in Q3 2026, Tipster Claims

description: Nothing Phone 3a Lite was launched in India on Thursday. It is a mid-range smartphone from the Carl Pei-led company and arrives as the latest addition to the Nothing Phone 3a series. The handset is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Pro chipset,  paired with 8GB of RAM and up to 256GB of onboard storage. The Nothing Phone 3a Lite comes with a new Glphy Light for alerts, which replaces the signature Glyph Interface.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Lite Launched in India with Dimensity 7300 Pro Chipset and 5,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: OnePlus Ace 6T launch date has been set for the first week of December. The upcoming handset will be offered in China in three colour options. It will be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC, paired with an 8,300mAh battery. It is teased to carry a dual rear camera unit, housed inside a square camera module. The handset is currently available in the country for pre-order. The supposed OnePlus Ace 6T rebranded version for the global markets, including India, dubbed OnePlus 15R, will debut in the same month.
title: OnePlus Ace 6T Launch Set for Early December; Key Specifications, Features Confirmed

description: Oppo is expanding the Reno 15 lineup beyond China, with multiple models appearing on global certification sites. The standard Reno 15 (CPH2825) has surfaced on the TUV database, confirming support for 80W fast charging, with the Reno 15 Pro (CPH2813) showing the same charging rating. The Reno 15, Reno 15 Pro, Reno 15 Pro Max, and Reno 15F have also been spotted on NBTC, BIS, and IMDA listings, indicating that an international launch is approaching.
title: Oppo Reno 15, Reno 15 Pro Charging Details Surface Through TUV Certification

description: An APK teardown from Samsung's One UI 8.5 beta build allegedly suggested that the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra will come with fast charging upgrades over its predecessor. The upcoming flagship may support 60W fast charging or Super fast charging 3.0. The Galaxy S25 and Galaxy S25 Edge have up to 25W fast charging, while the Galaxy S25+ and Galaxy S25 Ultra, in contrast, offer 45W speeds.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra May Get Super Fast Charging 3.0 Upgrade; Tips One UI 8.5 Code

description: Amazon Black Friday Sale 2025 early deals are now live. The sale event brings discounts on gaming consoles, smartphones, smartwatches, tablets, laptops, PCs, wearables, washing machines, projectors, smart TVs, refrigerators, geysers, and many more electronics. Customers will be able to avail an instant discount of 10 percent with Axis Bank, Bank of Baroda, HDFC Bank, and RBL Bank credit and debit cards. Additionally, Amazon Pay ICICI Bank Credit Card holders can get a 5 percent cashback.
title: Amazon Black Friday 2025: Early Deals Live; Discounts on PlayStation 5, Smartphones, Laptops and More

description: Flipkart’s Black Friday Sale, running from November 23 to 28, is offering major discounts across electronics and household categories. Bank offers from BOBCARD, HSBC, HDFC Bank, and SBI Card add extra savings. Samsung’s Galaxy S25 series is the title sponsor, with Boat and Mivi as associates. Intel-powered gaming laptops and Asus Chromebooks are available with EMI options. Key smartphone deals include the iPhone 16 at Rs. 57,999, Galaxy S24 at Rs. 40,999, Pixel 10 at Rs. 67,999, and several mid-range models at reduced prices.
title: Flipkart Black Friday Sale Live: Big Discounts on iPhone 16, Galaxy S24, Pixel 10 and More

description: Samsung could begin rolling out the One UI 8.5 beta next month. The One UI beta program is divided into phases and will be available in select global markets in the initial phases. Samsung Galaxy 26 series, which is expected to be launched earlier next year, could arrive with One UI 8.5 out of the box. The first beta build will initially be available in four markets. India and Poland could get the second beta build.
title: Samsung One UI 8.5 Beta Rollout Timeline Revealed in New Leak

description: Google announced earlier this month that Gemini would replace Google Assistant as the primary artificial intelligence (AI) assistant in Maps. This change is now finally said to be taking place. According to a report, Gemini is now available to help users in Google Maps, enabling them to start navigation to a destination, find places along the route, and share estimated time of arrival (ETA) with others, using simple voice-based commands.
title: Google Maps Reportedly Rolling Out Gemini Support for All Navigation Modes

description: The Xiaomi 17 Ultra is reportedly in the works as the top model in the upcoming Xiaomi 17 series. While there’s no confirmed launch timeline yet, a recent leak has hinted at its possible camera setup. According to the report, the phone may feature a triple rear camera arrangement, led by a 200-megapixel telephoto sensor. It could also get a 50-megapixel main camera, 50-megapixel ultra-wide-angle lens, and a 50-megapixel selfie shooter.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra to Reportedly Get a Triple Rear Camera System; May Debut With 200-Megapixel Telephoto Sensor

description: OnePlus 15R, Vivo X300 Pro, Vivo X300, Realme P4x 5G, and more smartphones are scheduled to launch in India in December. Moreover, various Chinese phone makers are also planning to unveil more handsets in their home country, including the Vivo S50 Pro Mini, Vivo S50, and Oppo Reno 15C. The upcoming OnePlus 15R is set to be the second phone in the company’s OnePlus 15 lineup. On the other hand, while the Vivo X300 Pro and Vivo X300 have already been launched in the Chinese and European markets, they will finally arrive in India early next month. Here is a list of handsets that will be launched in December 2025.
title: Upcoming Smartphones in December 2025: OnePlus 15R, Vivo X300 Series, Realme P4x 5G, and More
